These dealerships handle all aspects of the sales process, including marketing, financing, and servicing the vehicles.  Tesla, on the other hand, has chosen to bypass the traditional franchise model and sell its vehicles directly to consumers through its own company-owned stores and online. This direct-to-consumer model has caused some tension with traditional auto dealerships, which have sought to protect their own interests and maintain the traditional franchise model.  In some states, such as New Jersey, laws have been put in place that restrict or regulate the direct-to-consumer sales model, which has caused some challenges for Tesla. In what can be seen as a revolutionary move in the digital publishing space, Suntimes has announced that it is embracing the world of human-generated content.

The news comes after a period of decline in the interest of traditional publishers in human-generated content, as algorithms and artificial intelligence have become increasingly prevalent. But now, Suntimes is taking a stand and bringing back human-generated content with a vengeance.

The decision comes after months of discussion and research into what content best serves Suntimes readers. The team found that readers overwhelmingly prefer content that is generated by humans, as it presents a more reliable and accurate representation of the world.

This is not to say that Suntimes has completely given up on algorithms and artificial intelligence – quite the opposite, in fact. Instead, the company believes that the combination of human-generated content and the latest technological advances can be a winning one.

As such, Suntimes is now on the hunt for talented writers, photographers and videographers to join their team. They are looking for people who can provide insightful analysis, bold opinions and creative storytelling.

“We want people to get excited about creating content,” said Craig Hamilton, Senior Editor at Suntimes. “The combination of talented humans and technology will give our readers the best of both worlds.”

The company will also be rolling out a variety of other initiatives to make it easier for their human-generated content to reach the widest possible audience. For example, they are launching a new ‘Write for Us’ platform that will allow authors to publish their work on Suntimes and be rewarded for it.

Additionally, the team is partnering with other media outlets to promote human-generated content. As part of the initiative, Suntimes will be featuring the work of their human-generated content contributors on other leading platforms, such as The New York Times and The Wall Street Journal.

Suntimes is committed to embracing the power of human-generated content, and they are encouraging other digital publishers to follow suit.

“Human-generated content has the power to change the conversation and make a real difference in how people consume and interact with media,” said Hamilton. “This is the kind of content that will truly shape our future.”

With their new human-generated content initiative, Suntimes is showing that they are dedicated to providing their readers with the most engaging and accurate representation of the world. It’s an exciting time to be a digital publisher, and Suntimes is leading the way.

Heute hat das Bundesamt für Wirtschaft und Ausfuhrkontrolle (BAFA) bekanntgegeben, dass der Füllstand der Gasspeicher in Deutschland gestiegen ist. Der Wert betrug im November 2020 90,76 Prozent, eine Steigerung gegenüber dem Vormonat um mehr als 1 Prozent.

Gemäß dem BAFA ist der Anstieg der Gasbestände derzeit hauptsächlich auf den gesunkenen Gasverbrauch zurückzuführen. Insbesondere die Kälte im Dezember und Januar hat dazu beigetragen, dass weniger Gas verbraucht wurde. Darüber hinaus hat der schwache Niederschlag in den letzten Wochen auch den Anteil des Trinkwassers in den Gasspeichern verringert, was zu einem Anstieg der Gesamtkapazität geführt hat.

Der zunehmende Füllstand der Gasspeicher ist ein wichtiges Zeichen, dass Deutschland auf dem Weg zu einer nachhaltigeren Energieversorgung ist. Seit dem Beginn des Jahres 2020 hat die Bundesregierung große Anstrengungen unternommen, um den Anteil der erneuerbaren Energien am Strommix zu erhöhen und so die Abhängigkeit von fossilen Brennstoffen zu reduzieren. Mit dem Ziel, bis 2030 den Anteil von erneuerbaren Energien an der Stromerzeugung auf 65 Prozent zu erhöhen, hat die Bundesregierung die öffentliche Förderung von erneuerbaren Energien deutlich ausgeweitet.

Der Anstieg der Gasspeicherkapazität ist ein wichtiger Schritt auf dem Weg zu einer nachhaltigeren Energieversorgung in Deutschland. Der Anstieg der Gaskapazität bietet der deutschen Industrie mehr Flexibilität bei der Wahl der Energiequellen und ermöglicht es den Unternehmen, schneller auf sich ändernde Marktbedingungen zu reagieren.

Derzeit sind in Deutschland mehr als 20 Unternehmen in den Gasspeichermarkt involviert. Jedes Unternehmen speichert einen Teil der ausländischen Gase, die über die Grenzen in das Land gelangen. Die Gase werden in riesigen unterirdischen Tanks gelagert. Die Kosten für den Bau und Betrieb dieser Tanks werden von den Unternehmen getragen.

Der Anstieg des Füllstands der Gasspeicher in Deutschland ist auch ein gutes Zeichen für die Entwicklung des deutschen Gasnetzes. Durch den Anstieg des Füllstands wird die Nachfrage nach Gas auch zukünftig weiter steigen, was wiederum Investitionen in den Ausbau des Netzes erfordert. Auf diese Weise kann Deutschland eine sichere und stabile Versorgung mit Gas gewährleisten.

Der Anstieg des Füllstands der Gasspeicher ist ein positives Signal für die deutsche Energieindustrie. Der Anstieg des Füllstands zeigt, dass das Land auf dem richtigen Weg ist, um seine Energieversorgung zu modernisieren und auf nachhaltige Weise zu gestalten. The engine is rated at 375 horsepower and 470 lb-ft of torque, making it the most powerful engine available in a full-size pickup truck.

The 2023 F-150 also comes with several advanced driver-assistance systems. These include adaptive cruise control, lane-keeping assist, blind-spot monitoring, and automatic emergency braking. These systems help to make the 2023 F-150 one of the safest trucks on the road.

The 2023 Ford F-150 also comes with a range of comfort and convenience features. It has a power-adjustable driver's seat, power windows and locks, and a tilt-and-telescoping steering wheel. The truck also has an upgraded audio system with Apple CarPlay, Android Auto, and SiriusXM.

Overall, the 2023 Ford F-150 is an impressive truck that has it all. It has class-leading power, an impressive array of driver-assistance and connectivity features, a lightweight aluminum body, and an off-road-ready package. It's no wonder the F-150 is the top-selling truck in the US.

text: Memory leaks are the biggest cause of slowdown over time . To better illustrate what happens inside the computer , think of your operating system as a supermarket . The available shopping carts signify your memory and the shoppers are applications that are running . So at the start of the business day ( upon restart ) , you have all of the shopping carts available for use . As shoppers arrive , they take a cart and go about their business . The store does not know how long the shopper will need their cart , so it is the shopper 's responsibility to return the cart when they are done . However , as we all know ... not every shopper does their due diligence in returning carts and over time carts get lost / misplaced and never returned . By the end of the business day , all the shoppers have left the store but not all the carts have been properly returned . Now imagine if the supermarket was running 24 hours , they would run out of carts over time . By restarting your computer , you are effectively returning all the shopping carts back to their location making them available for shoppers again !
label: hc3human

Con la reciente liberación de una larga lista de documentos fiscales del expresidente Donald Trump, miles de personas se han quedado con preguntas sin respuesta sobre sus impuestos. Estos documentos revelan gran cantidad de detalles de los impuestos de Trump a lo largo de varios años, pero sus estados financieros siguen siendo un misterio.

La Casa Blanca anunció que el gobierno estadounidense recibió los estados financieros de Trump desde 2011 hasta 2017, aproximadamente la mitad del tiempo que ha estado en el cargo. Pero el gobierno no ha ofrecido ningún detalle sobre los estados financieros, ni siquiera sobre si los ha publicado.

La Casa Blanca señaló que los documentos financieros fueron liberados por el Servicio de Impuestos Internos (IRS). Sin embargo, el gobierno también ha guardado silencio sobre si el IRS realizó algún tipo de auditoría de los estados financieros de Trump o si hay alguna investigación en curso sobre sus impuestos.

Esto genera más preguntas sobre los impuestos de Trump, especialmente ahora que ha salido a la luz que Trump redujo drásticamente sus contribuciones durante el mandato.

Los documentos muestran que Trump pagó apenas $750 dólares de impuestos federales en 2017, el mismo año en que ingresó a la presidencia, y apenas $750 dólares en 2016. Esto contrasta con unos ingresos de $150 millones al año.

Trump también ha reportado pérdidas millonarias a lo largo de los años, lo que le permitió reducir considerablemente el monto de impuestos que debía pagar. Esto ha generado interrogantes sobre su situación financiera y si incurrió en algún tipo de actividad ilegal o de evasión de impuestos.

Además, Trump está involucrado en una serie de demandas judiciales por temas relacionados a sus impuestos. Estas demandas incluyen una demanda judicial sobre la defensa de la identidad del contribuyente que está sosteniendo el gobierno estadounidense, una demanda por desacato por parte del Congreso por una auditoría de sus impuestos, y una demanda de la Fiscalía de Manhattan por la exención de impuestos del Trump Organization.

Estas demandas se presentaron antes de que Trump dejara el cargo, pero aún así, todavía hay muchas preguntas sobre sus impuestos que no tienen respuesta. Y con la nueva información que se ha liberado, la presión está aumentando para que Trump sea transparente con sus estados financieros.

De momento, el Congreso y los fiscales no han recibido respuesta de la Casa Blanca sobre estas preguntas. A pesar de que los estados financieros están fuera del alcance de los ciudadanos, se espera que el gobierno de Estados Unidos comience a hablar sobre el tema en un futuro próximo.

En última instancia, el exmandatario todavía debe explicar a los estadounidenses por qué pagó tan pocos impuestos. Trump alega que pagó grandes cantidades de impuestos, pero la documentación liberada no respalda estas afirmaciones.

A pesar de que la Casa Blanca ha dicho que la liberación de documentos financieros de Trump fue un acto de transparencia gubernamental, muchos critican que los documentos no son suficientes para aclarar todas

text: HTML5 GIFs are able to take up less space than regular GIFs because they use a more efficient method of encoding the image data. Regular GIFs use a technique called "lossless" compression, which means that they try to reduce the file size of the image without losing any quality. This works well for simple images, but for more complex images with lots of colors and details, the file size can still be quite large. HTML5 GIFs, on the other hand, use a technique called "lossy" compression, which means that they sacrifice some image quality in order to reduce the file size even more. Lossy compression works by identifying parts of the image that are not as important and discarding them, which allows the image to be smaller without being noticeable to the viewer. Overall, HTML5 GIFs are able to provide similar or better quality than regular GIFs while taking up less space because they use a more efficient method of encoding the image data.

Tesla driver is charged with intentionally plunging his family off a California cliff.

On Friday, January 3, the California Highway Patrol (CHP) arrested the driver of a Tesla for willfully driving his family off a cliff. All of the passengers, including the driver, were found dead at the crash site.

The tragic incident occurred near the Pacific Coast Highway, in Westport, California. At approximately 11 pm Thursday night, witnesses reported seeing a white Tesla sedan speeding towards the cliff.

The CHP reported that the vehicle failed to slow down and crashed at the cliff’s edge. The sedan then plunged over the cliff and crashed into the Pacific Ocean. Witnesses were able to observe the vehicle’s fall and alerted the authorities. 

A search and rescue mission was launched shortly after the incident. The CHP, along with local and federal authorities, deployed air and watercrafts to search for survivors. After a thorough investigation, all bodies, including the driver, were recovered from the wreckage.

The driver, 39-year-old Jonathan Armstead, was found to have died as a result of blunt force trauma and drowning. All three passengers in his vehicle, his wife and two children, were declared dead on scene. All four were positively identified via DNA testing and fingerprints.

The CHP conducted an extensive investigation into the cause of the accident. After a thorough examination of the vehicle’s systems and other data, authorities determined that the Tesla had been intentionally driven off the cliff.

Based on their findings, the CHP has charged Jonathan Armstead with four counts of manslaughter and one count of reckless driving. He is expected to be arraigned later this week.

This tragic incident has left the community of Westport reeling. Neighbor and friend of the family, John Smith, spoke with reporters on Friday: 

“It’s heartbreaking. The Armsteads were such a nice family. This is just so tragic, I can’t even put it into words.” 

Jonathan Armstead’s family released a statement about the incident, expressing their grief and shock. They went on to state that Jonathan had been struggling with depression for some time and that the family had been trying to get him help.

The cause of Jonathan Armstead’s depression has not been revealed and the family has asked for privacy as they grieve.

The incident is still under investigation and authorities are asking for anyone with information about the case to come forward. 

This is a horrible tragedy and the thoughts and prayers of the entire community are with the Armstead family.

text: A "balance transfer" is paying one credit card with another.  You probably get offers in the mail to do this all of the time.  As other posters have noted, however, this usually comes with finance fees rather than the rewards that you get for normal purchases because it's written into your credit card agreement as a different class of transaction with different rules. I'm not sure if it's urban legend or true, but I have heard stories that suggest there were some "loop holes" in the earliest credit card reward plans that allowed for something like what you want.  I doubt that any plan ever allowed exactly what you've written, but I've heard stories about people buying gift cards from merchants and then using the gift cards to pay their bill.  This loop hole (if it ever existed) is closed now, but it would have allowed for essentially infinite generation of rewards at no cost to the cardholder.  The banks and credit card companies have a lot of years of experience at this sort of thing now, so the threshold for you finding something that works and conforms with the cardholder agreement is pretty small.

text: It is because your eye actually has two types of light detectors , called rods and cones . Rods are really good at detecting light , but they can not see color very well . However , cones are very good at detecting colors , but they are not as sensitive to small amounts of light . What is cool is that cones are really only located in the center of your eye , and you have rods everywhere else . When you look away from a star , the star is no longer seen by your color - seeing cones , but instead it is detected by your light detecting rods . What is really cool about this is it means that aside from the very center of our vision , we barely see any color !

text: "Al dente" and "a la carte" are both phrases that come from other languages. "Al dente" is an Italian phrase that means "to the tooth." It is used to describe pasta or rice that is cooked until it is firm, but not too soft. "A la carte" is a French phrase that means "on the card." It is used to describe a way of ordering food in a restaurant, where each item is ordered separately and is priced individually, rather than ordering a set meal or choosing items from a fixed-price menu.  Using words from other languages can be a way to add variety and flavor to the English language. It can also help to convey a specific meaning or concept that might not have an equivalent word in English. However, it is also possible to use English words and phrases to describe these same concepts. For example, instead of "al dente," we could say "firm to the bite" or "slightly firm." Instead of "a la carte," we could say "order items separately" or "order items individually."

The Himalayas are a mountain range that was formed when the Indian plate collided with the Eurasian plate. The collision of these two plates caused the land to rise up and form the Himalayas.

The Indian plate is still moving and colliding with the Eurasian plate, and this process is what is responsible for the continued uplift of the Himalayas. The collision of the two plates is also responsible for the earthquakes that occur in the region.

The Indian plate will not disappear completely because of this collision. Instead, the collision will continue to push the Himalayas higher and higher over millions of years. The process of plate tectonics, which is the movement of the Earth's plates, is slow, and it takes a long time for the effects of the collision to be visible.

So, to answer your question, the Indian plate will not disappear, but it will continue to push against the Eurasian plate, and this will cause the Himalayas to continue to rise.

Le ciglia sono un importante elemento di bellezza femminile. Danno ai tuoi occhi un aspetto più accattivante e possono anche cambiare la percezione di una persona. Purtroppo, non tutti hanno forti e folti ciglia, ma se non sei una di quelle persone fortunate, non preoccuparti. Esistono alcune tecniche e prodotti che possono aiutarti a far crescere le ciglia più velocemente e farle sembrare più folte.

Innanzitutto, c'è la questione di come far crescere le ciglia velocemente. Dovresti iniziare con uno shampoo adatto alle ciglia, che aiuta a nutrire e mantenere i follicoli delle ciglia sani. Se ritieni che le tue ciglia siano piuttosto grasse, potresti anche aggiungere un conditioner leggero alla tua routine di cura delle ciglia. Inoltre, puoi usare un siero allungante delle ciglia o usare una spazzola da ciglia, che stimola i follicoli per far crescere le ciglia in modo più sano e veloce.

Inoltre, se vuoi che le tue ciglia siano folte, dovrai applicare un trucco specifico. Puoi provare l'eyeliner liquido, che può aiutare a rendere le tue ciglia più folte e ben definite. Inoltre, ci sono alcune alternative di ombretto che sono anche formulati appositamente per aiutare a rendere le ciglia più folte. Dovresti anche essere consapevole dei prodotti che stai applicando alle tue ciglia. Assicurati di evitare prodotti troppo aggressivi e di optare per prodotti a base di ingredienti naturali.

Infine, se vuoi che le tue ciglia siano lucide, dovrai assicurarti che siano ben nutrite. Usa prodotti a base di oli naturali come l'olio di ricino o l'olio di jojoba per aiutare a mantenere le tue ciglia lucide. Puoi anche usare un prodotto per la definizione delle ciglia, come l'eyeliner o l'ombretto, che può aiutare a conferire lucentezza alle tue ciglia. Infine, dovresti anche assicurarti di avere sempre un asciugamano pulito a portata di mano per rimuovere eventuali tracce di trucco dalle tue ciglia prima di andare a letto.

Certo, non c'è mai una garanzia di successo con la cura delle ciglia. Tuttavia, se segui questi consigli, avrai maggiori possibilità di ottenere risultati veloci, folti e lucidi. Dai un'occhiata ai nostri prodotti per la cura delle ciglia per iniziare a far crescere, proteggere e valorizzare le tue ciglia.

Se sogni di avere forti, lucidi e folti ciglia, puoi provare alcune di queste tecniche per farle crescere più velocemente e renderle più sane. Se stai già usando prodotti per la cura delle ciglia, ricorda di verificare che non contengano ingredienti dannosi. Segui sempre il tuo istinto e sentiti libera di provare e sperimentare cosa funziona meglio per te.

(Reuters) - Iranian chess grandmaster Dorsa Derakhshani was warned not to return to Iran after she competed in the Tradewise Gibraltar Chess Festival without wearing a hijab, a source close to the family said on Saturday.

The 22-year-old made headlines in 2017 when she competed in the Tradewise Gibraltar Chess Festival without wearing a hijab, in defiance of a ban imposed by Iranian authorities in 2017 requiring women to cover their hair when outside the home.

At the time, she was immediately dropped from the national team and told to return home, though she chose to stay in Europe.

Derakhshani is now based in Spain, where she has been competing in the Spanish league for the past two years.

The source, who spoke on condition of anonymity, said Derakhshani recently returned to Tehran to see her family, but was warned by officials not to return.

The source also said Derakhshani had received numerous threats from Iranian officials warning her not to continue her professional chess career without a hijab.

"Dorsa was very scared," the source said. "The government was very unhappy with her decision not to wear a hijab and they warned her not to return to Iran or she would face a harsh punishment."

Derakhshani's case has been widely condemned by human rights organizations and chess players around the world, who have called for her to be allowed to continue her career in Iran.

The World Chess Federation (FIDE), the game's governing body, has also criticized Iran for its "unreasonable treatment" of Derakhshani and called on the Iranian government to end its discrimination against female chess players.

In response, Iran's chess federation has denied Derakhshani’s claims and said she had never been sanctioned for playing without a hijab.

However, the source said Derakhshani and her family were still being threatened by the authorities.

"Dorsa was very much scared and she was clearly warned to not come back," the source said. "So far she is complying with the order."

Derakhshani is one of many Iranian women who have been targeted by authorities for challenging the country’s traditional gender norms.

In December, Iranian actress Sadaf Taherian was sentenced to one year in prison and 90 lashes for appearing in public without a hijab.

And in November, a group of young Iranian women were arrested for dancing in a video that was posted to Instagram.

The Iranian authorities claim that the Islamic dress code is necessary to protect the country’s culture and morals.

But the hardliners’ restrictive regulations have been met with increasing resistance and protests from a generation of young Iranians, who are increasingly pushing back against the authorities’ attempts to control their behavior and appearance.

The source said the Derakhshani family was feeling increasingly vulnerable and did not know what would happen next.

"We are all very worried," the source said. "Dorsa's case is a very sad example of the way the Iranian government is trying to control the behavior of its citizens."

text: When a company or individual owes money to another company or individual, that debt is known as a "credit obligation." Sometimes, the company or individual who is owed money may not have the resources or the desire to try to collect the debt themselves. In these cases, they may decide to sell the debt to another company.  The company that buys the debt is usually hoping to make a profit by collecting the debt from the person or company who owes it. text: The Heisenberg uncertainty principle is a principle in quantum mechanics that explains the fundamental limits of our ability to know certain things about a particle, such as its position and momentum. It states that the more precisely we know the position of a particle, the less precisely we can know its momentum, and vice versa. This is because the act of measuring one of these quantities affects the other.  Imagine that you are trying to measure the position and momentum of a ball. You can use a ruler to measure the position of the ball by seeing where it is on the ruler. But if you want to measure the momentum of the ball, you might need to push it or throw it in order to measure its speed. However, the act of pushing or throwing the ball will change its momentum, so you can't get an accurate measurement of both the position and momentum of the ball at the same time.  This is similar to how the Heisenberg uncertainty principle works in quantum mechanics. When we try to measure the position of a particle, we have to interact with it in some way, and this interaction changes the particle's momentum. This means that we can't know both the position and momentum of the particle with complete accuracy at the same time. We have to choose which one we want to measure more accurately, and this means that there will always be some uncertainty in our knowledge of the other quantity.

Robert Duncan had been sitting in his recliner for weeks. He was a collector of old 78 rpm records — the kind that plays songs from the 1920s and 1930s. 

Duncan had been slowly building a collection of vintage discs since he was a teenager. But with an unexpected career change and the recent pandemic, Duncan’s hobbies had taken a backseat. 

So, when he moved his recliner to clean the floor, he was horrified to find dozens of records tucked away in the dark crevices. As he put it, “I had completely forgotten about them!” 

With the discovery of his long-forgotten gems, Duncan decided he’d do something with them. 

He reached out to a friend, Joanna White, a producer at his local NPR affiliate. White suggested he digitize the records and sell them online as part of a digital collection. 

Duncan was intrigued by the idea and immediately got to work. He gathered up his records and began cataloging them, so he could prepare them to be digitally restored. 

Using specialized software and equipment, Duncan restored the audio from the records. To his surprise, the recordings sounded vibrant and alive. 

“It was like I was hearing the songs for the first time,” Duncan said.

For the next several weeks, Duncan devoted himself to bringing the recordings to life. He selected artwork for each record, wrote liner notes, and then uploaded them to a website he designed with the help of White. 

The response to the collection was instant and overwhelming. The records quickly sold out, and people from all over the world began sending Duncan stories about their memories of the songs. 

Duncan was so touched by the response he decided to donate his collection of restored records to the National Recording Registry. 

“It felt like the right thing to do,” he said. “These recordings shouldn’t just be lost in my recliner — they should be shared with others who appreciate them.”

The National Recording Registry, which is run by the Library of Congress, is dedicated to preserving historical recordings for future generations. As of now, Duncan’s collection is the only one of its kind in the registry. 

“We’re honored to have Robert’s collection in our archives,” said Melanie Blinn, the director of the National Recording Registry. “It’s a testament to his dedication and passion for preserving these beautiful recordings. We’re so grateful that he’s entrusted us with these treasured songs.”

Duncan’s passion for music has inspired countless people around the world. His story is a reminder that even in these tumultuous times, a little creativity and hard work can help preserve our past — and shape our future.

The entire incident lasted just over three hours, and the butter was eventually pumped back into the facility’s storage room, where it is expected to be disposed of properly.

Although the fire may have caused a significant disruption, experts say it could have been much worse. Fortunately, the swift response of local and federal officials prevented the incident from turning into a major environmental disaster.

In the last few years, restaurant chains have been investing heavily in robotics and automation technologies. Chains ranging from big names like McDonald's to smaller chains like Wendy's are investing in these technologies to speed up production, improve efficiency, reduce costs, and maintain consistent quality.

The move to robotics and automation has been most noticeable in the fast food industry, where robots have been used to help prepare food. Restaurants have also begun experimenting with automated ordering and payments, robotic kitchen assistants, and even robot servers. But what does this mean for the workers?

The restaurant industry has long relied on human labor to prepare food, serve customers, and complete other tasks. These jobs typically offer low wages and limited advancement opportunities, making them particularly vulnerable to automation. Restaurants are now using robots to replace these workers, eliminating the need for human labor altogether. This can lead to lower labor costs and improved efficiency, allowing restaurant owners to focus on growing their businesses without relying on expensive labor.

At the same time, robots can potentially improve the quality of food service, as they are able to accurately and consistently prepare meals in a fraction of the time of a human worker. This can lead to improved customer satisfaction, as well as reduced food waste. Additionally, robots can work around the clock with minimal maintenance, meaning restaurants don’t have to worry about labor availability or costs associated with hiring and training new workers.

Despite these potential benefits, the impact of robotics and automation on workers is a cause for concern. Automation has the potential to cause job losses and displacement, which could have a major economic impact on the restaurant industry. While some jobs may be replaced by robots, others could be shifted to more specialized roles, such as restaurant consultants and managers.

Robots and automation technologies also create new challenges for the industry. Automation can increase inequality between workers, as some are better equipped to adjust to these new technologies than others. Robots may also lead to an increase in repetitive work and an overall decline in creativity and innovation.

The restaurant industry must be aware of the potential consequences of adopting robotics and automation technologies, and ensure that any changes are carried out in a way that is fair to workers. This includes providing training and retraining opportunities to those affected by automation, as well as considering other measures such as minimum wages and benefits.

Overall, robotics and automation in the restaurant industry offers some potential benefits. It can lead to improved efficiency and quality, as well as reduced costs and waste. However, these benefits must be balanced against the potential negative impacts on workers. It is essential that restaurant owners consider these issues when investing in robotics and automation technologies, and ensure that any changes are made in a way that is fair to all.

This proof works by assuming that pi is rational (that it can be expressed as a fraction) and then showing that this assumption leads to a logical contradiction or inconsistency. This means that the assumption must be false, and therefore pi must be irrational.

Microsoft heeft een nieuw stuk software ontwikkeld, genaamd ChatGPT, waarvan er wordt gezegd dat het de kracht van de zoekmachine van Microsoft, Bing, zal versterken.

Microsoft heeft de software ontwikkeld om de communicatie tussen Bing-gebruikers te verbeteren, waardoor eenvoudiger en kortere zoekopdrachten mogelijk worden. Het bedrijf hoopt dat het zo gemakkelijker voor gebruikers wordt om informatie te vinden via het zoekplatform van Microsoft.

De software is gebaseerd op een kunstmatige intelligentie-model dat is ontwikkeld door de onderzoekers van Microsoft Research. Het model, dat een vorm van "dialoogmodellering" gebruikt, gebruikt bestaande en toekomstige gegevens om suggesties te maken voor zoekopdrachten.

Met het model dat ChatGPT genoemd wordt, kan Microsoft data gebruiken om zoekvragen voor te stellen die de gebruikers kunnen uitvoeren. Bijvoorbeeld, als een gebruiker binnenkomt met de vraag naar een bepaalde gebeurtenis, kan het systeem voorstellen dat de gebruiker meer informatie zoekt met betrekking tot dat onderwerp.

Het model leert ook hoe zoekopdrachten beter te structureren, waardoor gebruikers beter antwoorden kunnen krijgen op hun vragen. Microsoft denkt dat de technologie de manier waarop mensen zoeken op het internet, zal veranderen.

Microsoft is ook geïnteresseerd in het inzetten van ChatGPT om Bing-gebruikers te helpen bij hun online navigatie. Het bedrijf denkt dat gebruikers baat hebben bij de software als het hun helpt om betere resultaten te krijgen, wat betekent dat ze sneller informatie kunnen vinden.

Het bedrijf heeft bevestigd dat het zijn ChatGPT-model gaat integreren met het Bing-platform, maar heeft nog niet bekendgemaakt wanneer de technologie beschikbaar zal zijn voor publiek gebruik. Het bedrijf zegt dat het de technologie test op hun eigen platform en verder onderzoek doet om te bekijken of de software ook andere soorten zoekopdrachten kan verbeteren.

Microsoft denkt dat ChatGPT hun zoekmachine Bing zal helpen om meer informatie te vinden op het web en daarom meer kans zal bieden op betere zoekresultaten voor de gebruikers. Hoewel het bedrijf nog geen datum heeft bekendgemaakt voor de lancering van de technologie, verwachten analisten dat de software binnenkort beschikbaar zal zijn voor gebruik.

Het bedrijf hoopt dat hun software hun zoekmachine Bing zal versterken en dat het gebruikers zal helpen meer relevante informatie te vinden op het web. De ontwikkeling van het ChatGPT-model is een mijlpaal voor Microsoft, omdat het de kans biedt om de kracht van hun zoekmachine verder te versterken.

On Monday, Barclays downgraded Ally Financial Inc. from "overweight" to "equal weight" due to concerns about the company's vulnerability in 2023. 

Barclays analyst Arun Melman said in a note to clients that the Detroit-based bank was "well positioned" to benefit from the improving economic recovery, but that the outlook for 2023 and beyond was less certain.

"Given the recent deterioration in the credit outlook and our view that the economic recovery could be slower than initially anticipated, we believe Ally is more vulnerable to an unfavorable operating environment in 2023," Melman wrote.

He added that Ally's "solid capitalization" would allow it to maintain its current credit rating, but noted that it was at risk for a downgrade if the recovery slows or there is another downturn.

In addition to the downgrade, Melman also lowered his price target for the bank from $43 to $37, citing increased regulatory scrutiny as a key risk. He said that Ally's higher proportion of short-term debt and less-liquid assets could make it a target for regulators.

The analyst also noted that Ally's loan growth has outpaced industry peers over the past year, a trend that could lead to higher credit costs. He added that Ally's higher loan growth could cause investors to reassess their risk tolerance as the industry normalizes.

Despite these concerns, Melman said that Ally's "positive" operating environment and higher-than-peer loan growth should help it remain attractive to investors. He also noted that the bank's "solid" online deposit growth and low cost of funds could make it attractive to depositors, even with the potential for further regulatory scrutiny.

Overall, the analyst said that investors should take a "cautious" approach with Ally, given the increased uncertainty around the 2023 economic environment and the risk of regulatory scrutiny. He added that investors should look for signs of an improving operating environment before making a long-term commitment.

In response to the downgrade, Ally shares fell by 2.3 percent in morning trading on Monday. The stock had already lost 13 percent over the past three months.

The downgrade comes after a tumultuous period for the bank, which has faced headwinds from the coronavirus pandemic. Ally was forced to lay off over 1,600 employees earlier this year, and its profits were down 24 percent in the third quarter due to higher provisions for loan losses.

Despite the challenges, Ally has continued to post strong loan and deposit growth. The bank reported a 19 percent year-over-year increase in loans in the third quarter and a 24 percent increase in deposits.

Although the company has been successful in weathering the pandemic, it is likely to remain under pressure as the economy recovers in 2023. With the new Barclays downgrade in mind, investors should approach the stock with caution.

Investors are increasingly turning to ETFs to diversify their portfolios and access a wide range of asset classes. One of the most popular ETFs is the SPDR® Portfolio Short Term Corporate Bond ETF (SPSB).

SPSB tracks the performance of a market-weighted index composed of short-term corporate bonds. The fund has become popular in recent years due to its combination of low costs, diversification, and liquid trading.

What is the SPDR® Portfolio Short Term Corporate Bond ETF?

The SPDR® Portfolio Short Term Corporate Bond ETF (SPSB) is an exchange-traded fund (ETF) that provides exposure to a broad range of short-term corporate bonds. The fund is managed by State Street Global Advisors and tracks the performance of the Bloomberg Barclays U.S. 1-5 Year Corporate Bond Index. The index is composed of investment-grade bonds issued by U.S. companies.

The fund is designed to provide investors with easy access to the short-term corporate bond market. It is composed of a broad range of corporate bonds with an average duration of 1.1 years, making it a good choice for investors looking for income without taking on too much interest rate risk. The fund also has a relatively low expense ratio of 0.04%, making it a cost-effective way to gain exposure to the corporate bond market.

Why are investors flocking to the SPDR® Portfolio Short Term Corporate Bond ETF?

Investors have been flocking to the SPDR® Portfolio Short Term Corporate Bond ETF in recent years for several reasons. Firstly, the fund provides investors with access to a broad range of short-term corporate bonds. This diversification can help reduce volatility and minimize the impact of any individual issuer’s credit risk.

The fund also offers investors a convenient and liquid way to gain exposure to the short-term corporate bond market. This makes it an attractive choice for investors who want to quickly and easily add bonds to their portfolios.

The fund also has a low expense ratio of 0.04%. This is significantly lower than the average expense ratio of actively managed corporate bond funds, making it a cost-effective option for investors looking to gain exposure to the corporate bond market.

The Bottom Line

The SPDR® Portfolio Short Term Corporate Bond ETF has become increasingly popular in recent years due to its combination of low costs, diversification, and liquidity. The fund provides investors with easy access to a broad range of short-term corporate bonds, allowing them to diversify their portfolios and access income without taking on too much interest rate risk. When Tom Hanks appeared in the 2002 drama A Man Called Otto, he was at the peak of his acting career, and it showed. The Oscar-winning actor brought a unique mix of empathy, humor, and occasional grumpiness to his role as Otto, a cantankerous recluse living alone in the Oregon woods. In the film, Otto is forced to confront his past and makes an unlikely connection with a young woman named Emily (Scarlett Johansson).

The film, directed by Brad Silberling, was a critical success and hailed by many as one of Hanks’ most compelling performances. Now, a decade after its release, the film is getting a second look courtesy of a new documentary, Look, I’m Selfish: Tom Hanks Gets Grumpy in ‘A Man Called Otto’. The doc, which premiered at the Cleveland International Film Festival earlier this year, revisits the story and the characters of Otto, delving deeper into their motivations and exploring the themes of love, loyalty, and redemption.

Look, I’m Selfish features interviews with Hanks and several members of the cast and crew, as well as original footage from the set. But the documentary isn’t simply a retrospective; it also provides an intimate look at the actor’s process, as Hanks works through his frustrations and anxieties in rehearsals and on the set.

In the film, Otto is a complex character who is struggling with his inner demons and trying to find his place in the world. Hanks’ performance manages to capture both the character’s vulnerabilities and his pride, and in the documentary, the actor gets candid about his experience with the character.

“It was one of the most challenging roles I’ve ever done, and I knew it was going to be that way going in,” Hanks said. “I had to face the character’s flaws, but at the same time, I had to find the courage to believe in him and give him a chance.”

The documentary also features interviews with Silberling and several other members of the cast and crew. Most tellingly, the documentary shows glimpses of the actor’s process as he grapples with the character’s emotions and motivations.

“It was intense. We did a lot of work on the character, and I think the rehearsal process was really essential in helping us define the character’s inner world,” Silberling said. “But ultimately, it was all Tom’s doing. He was willing to go to all these dark places and explore Otto’s anger, his hurt, and his vulnerability.”

Ultimately, Look, I’m Selfish is a fascinating exploration of the actor’s process and a testament to the power of Hanks’ performance. The documentary is a must-see for any fan of A Man Called Otto and for anyone interested in the craft of acting.

“It was an incredible experience for me,” Hanks said. “I’m humbled by the response to this film, and I hope people will take away something meaningful from watching it.”

text: When a car is moving quickly, the wheels may appear to be spinning in the opposite direction because of a phenomenon called the stroboscopic effect. The stroboscopic effect occurs when an object is moving quickly and it is observed through a series of brief, intermittent glimpses.  Imagine you are standing on the side of the road and you see a car driving past you. If the car is moving slowly, you will see the wheels turning in the direction that the car is moving. But if the car is moving very quickly, you will only see brief glimpses of the wheels as it passes by. Because the wheels are turning so quickly, it may appear that they are spinning in the opposite direction.  This is similar to how a spinning fan appears to be standing still when you look at it through a camera with a fast shutter speed. The blades of the fan are moving so quickly that they appear to be in the same position in each frame of the photograph.  So, to summarize: the wheels of a car do not actually spin in the opposite direction, it just appears that way because of the stroboscopic effect.

Olive Garden parent company Darden Restaurants Inc reported a stronger-than-expected quarterly profit on Wednesday as customers returned to dine in restaurants and new safety protocols kept customers coming back.

The company's upbeat outlook sent its shares up nearly 5 percent in premarket trading.

For the fourth quarter ended Nov. 29, Darden reported earnings per share of $1.41, beating estimates of $1.37. Revenue rose 5.9 percent to $2.54 billion, also topping expectations of $2.52 billion.

Sales at Olive Garden were up 6.7 percent from the same period a year ago, fueled by a 3.2 percent increase in same-store sales. Same-store sales at Darden's other chains, including LongHorn Steakhouse and Cheddar's Scratch Kitchen, also rose 2.6 percent.

The company's sales at established locations grew even as the pandemic continued to sap consumer spending. Darden credited its safety measures, including expanded takeout and delivery options, and improved customer service, for its success.

"In this unprecedented environment, our teams have demonstrated their remarkable resilience, drive and focus on providing a safe and enjoyable experience for our guests," Chief Executive Officer Gene Lee said in a statement.

The company also raised its outlook for the 2021 fiscal year, expecting adjusted earnings per share to grow by 6 percent to 8 percent, compared with its prior forecast of 2 percent to 4 percent.

Darden is one of the first major restaurant chains to report earnings in a period marked by wild swings in restaurant traffic caused by the pandemic.

In the United States, sales at casual dining restaurants dropped 26.2 percent in November as indoor dining restrictions tightened and cold weather kept people at home. Still, some areas, including the Midwest, reported high levels of demand at casual dining restaurants.

Darden's ability to navigate the pandemic-induced turbulence sets it apart from smaller rivals. The company has cut costs by closing underperforming locations and suspending its dividend payment, and has invested heavily in off-premises dining services, including delivery and takeout.

The company said it expects sales to continue to be challenged by the pandemic in 2021, but believes it can be successful by focusing on safety and executing its strategies.

"We are on track to return to positive sales growth in the second quarter of our fiscal year 2021 and remain confident in our ability to deliver positive adjusted earnings growth for the full year," Lee said.

Shares of Darden were up 4.8 percent to $118.86 in premarket trading after the report. The stock has risen 7 percent so far this year, compared with a 3.2 percent gain for the S&P 500.

Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy and Russian President Vladimir Putin have offered contrasting messages of hope in their New Year speeches, with both pledging victory against challenges facing their countries.

In his annual New Year address on Tuesday, Zelenskiy called 2020 a difficult year due to the coronavirus pandemic, but said Ukraine had achieved positive results.

"This year, we were able to do things that we thought were impossible," he said. "We showed the world that we are strong, determined and capable of victory."

Zelenskiy said Ukraine had achieved the highest economic growth rate in Europe, and he vowed to focus on the economy in 2021.

"We will continue to make Ukraine a leader in the region and ensure that every citizen can feel the results of our efforts," he said.

In his address, Putin also acknowledged the challenges posed by the pandemic, saying it had brought loss and suffering. But he said Russia had coped with the crisis and was on the path to recovery.

"We will finish the year on a positive note: Russia's economy will have its first annual increase in three years," he said.

Putin also touted the success of Russia's COVID-19 vaccine, calling it a "scientific breakthrough". He said the vaccine had become a "symbol of a victorious future".

The two leaders also addressed the conflict in eastern Ukraine. Zelenskiy said his government had taken steps to de-escalate tensions and resolve the conflict.

"The way to peace lies through diplomacy and dialogue," he said.

Putin, however, accused Ukraine of stalling the peace process and called on Kiev to make concessions.

"Our goal is to end the war and find an acceptable solution for all. We must create conditions for the restoration of economic ties between the conflicting parties, and facilitate the exchange of prisoners of war," he said.

The speeches highlighted the stark differences between the two countries. While Zelenskiy focused on the economy and the path to peace, Putin emphasized military might and power.

The speeches also echoed the two countries' stances towards the West. While Zelenskiy said Ukraine should pursue closer ties with the European Union and the United States, Putin warned against "foreign interference".

Despite the differences, the two presidents pledged victory in 2021. For Zelenskiy, the victory lies in prosperity and peace; for Putin, it lies in national strength and technological advancement.

"We will face 2021 with determination and optimism," Zelenskiy said. "The future belongs to those who can change it. Let's work together to make our dreams come true."

text: The reason is that your urine is based on your blood filtering through your kidneys . This is a constant process , so you are always producing urine which needs to be emptied . Pretty much any time , day or night , if you said to yourself " I am going to go pee , even though I do n't need to , " you would manage to pee at least something . Your stool , unlike your urine , is based on the food that you eat . You eat food in short time segments , in between which are long periods of not - eating . The food you eat has a VERY long path to travel from your mouth to your bowel , so long that when you pass stool , it is probably from food you ate the day before . Since food passes through your digestive tract slowly , the individual food - remains stay separated , and the urge to pass each stool only arises when the fecal matter comes into the area of the anal sphincter , which your brain interprets as a need to use the toilet . The release of stool and the release of urine both require relaxing sphincters in your pelvic region . So when you need to poo , it is simply convenient also to pee ( as you are pretty much guaranteed to have urine waiting to be expelled ) . But since you will have to pee more often , it is not always urgent for you to poo .

text: Usually when you delete a file on a HDD the data is n't actually deleted . Instead , the drive is just told that the area where the data is stored is n't important anymore and it can be written over . If you keep using the HDD , it will eventually overwrite the old data , but the data will remain on the drive until then . Your operating system tells you that the space on the disk is free because it 's available to use for storage whenever you need it , but the computer is n't going to go changing the data until you have something else to store there . You can use a file shredder to clear the data out , but most people do n't do that . Additionally , HDDs use a magnetic field to store information . A strong field indicates a 1 and a weak field indicates a 0 . However , magnetic fields are n't binary and with a lot of work you can sometimes figure out what deleted data was based on the strength of the magnetic fields that remain . Edit : You ca n't actually recover any meaningful data this way . On older , less dense magnetic storage media it may have been a possibility , but that 's not the case with any relatively modern HDD . The idea comes from a guy named Gutmann who wrote a paper on it in 1996 . It would have been hard to do then and Gutmann himself has said it would be next to impossible these days . It works differently with internal SSDs . Those usually clear the data out after it 's deleted because and SSD can only store data in an empty spot . Consequently , your computer goes ahead and clears out the data after it 's deleted to speed up the process of writing new data to that area in the future .
label: hc3human

The tiny island of Hawaii is known for its stunning beaches, beautiful coastline and lush landscapes. But if you’re looking for an experience with a little more “wow” factor, there’s now a unique option—camping near an active volcano.

The unconventional Airbnb rental sits on the side of Kilauea volcano in Hawaii Volcanoes National Park and offers an incredible view of both the lava and the stars at night. And it’s proving to be a popular option with travelers, as the rental brings in a whopping $28,000 per year.

The unique Airbnb listing, which is owned by local couple Tony and Deborah Moreira, includes a tent and camping equipment for two people. The tent itself is made of canvas and is surrounded by trees and foliage for privacy.

It’s located just 2.4 miles from Kilauea volcano, meaning guests have the incredible experience of seeing active lava and hearing the sounds of the volcano in the distance.

The unique tent is listed on Airbnb for $80 per night and can accommodate up to four people. Reviews are overwhelmingly positive, with guests noting the “amazing” views, the convenient location and the “incredible” experience they had while staying in the tent.

The fact that the rental is bringing in such a large amount of money isn’t exactly a surprise. After all, Kilauea is one of the most active volcanoes on Earth, meaning guests are likely to catch a glimpse of lava and even enjoy some volcanic activity while they stay.

Plus, the tent itself is quite luxurious. In addition to the canvas and camping equipment, guests also have access to a hot shower, composting toilet, and picnic table and fire pit for cooking meals and staying warm.

Not only does the rental offer an incredible experience, but it also helps contribute to the local economy, as the Moreiras employ local staff to help maintain the property and keep it tidy for guests.

What’s even more remarkable is that the rental only opened in February of 2021 and is already such a hit. It’s proving to be a great success story for both the Moreiras and the local economy, and it’s certainly no surprise that it’s bringing in such a large sum of money.

It’s certainly a unique experience and one that more and more people are taking advantage of. So if you’re looking for an exciting, one-of-a-kind adventure, look no further than this Airbnb tent near a Hawaiian volcano.

text: There are a few ways that we can determine the distance to stars and other objects in the universe. One way is by using something called parallax. Parallax is the apparent shift in the position of an object against the background when viewed from different angles. For example, if you hold your finger up in front of you and close one eye, then open that eye and close the other eye, your finger will appear to move against the background. This is because you are looking at it from two different angles. We can use this same principle to determine the distance to nearby stars. By measuring the apparent shift in the position of a star against the background of more distant stars (as viewed from opposite sides of Earth's orbit around the sun), we can calculate how far away the star is. This method is most accurate for stars that are relatively close to us (within a few hundred light-years). For more distant objects, such as quasars and galaxies, we use other methods to determine their distance. One such method is called the cosmic distance ladder, which involves using a series of "rungs" or steps to measure the distance to increasingly distant objects. Each rung of the ladder relies on a different type of "standard candle," which is an object that is known to have a certain intrinsic brightness. By measuring the brightness of the object as seen from Earth, we can determine its distance. For example, one type of standard candle that we use is a type of star called a Cepheid variable. These stars have a very regular pulse, and the time between pulses is directly related to the star's intrinsic brightness. By measuring the time between pulses, we can determine the star's brightness, and therefore its distance. Once we have determined the distance to a Cepheid variable, we can use it as a "rung" on the cosmic distance ladder to measure the distance to other objects that are farther away. For example, we can use Cepheid variables to measure the distance to nearby galaxies, and then use those galaxies as "rungs" to measure the distance to even more distant galaxies. This way, we can build up a "ladder" of distances that reaches all the way out to the most distant objects in the universe.

text: Going public means that a company becomes a publicly traded company and starts selling shares of its stock to the public. There are a few reasons why a company might choose to go public: To raise money: Going public can be a way for a company to raise a lot of money quickly. When a company goes public, it sells shares of its stock to investors. The company can use the money it raises from the sale of these shares to fund its operations, pay off debt, or invest in new projects. To increase visibility: Being a publicly traded company can increase a company's visibility and reputation. This can be especially important for smaller companies that are trying to gain recognition in their industry. To give shareholders a way to sell their shares: When a company is privately held, it can be difficult for shareholders to sell their shares. Going public gives shareholders a way to sell their shares on the stock market, which can be attractive to some shareholders who want to cash in their investment. To give employees a way to sell their shares: Some companies offer stock options to their employees as a form of compensation. Going public gives these employees a way to sell their shares and potentially make a profit. So, in short, a company might go public to raise money, increase visibility, give shareholders a way to sell their shares, and give employees a way to sell their shares.

En enero, para muchas personas, estamos recibiendo las tarjetas de Navidad, viendo la factura de gas, agua y electricidad más alta y, en muchos casos, tenemos los salarios congelados. Puede ser difícil ahorrar dinero durante un mes tan caro. Por suerte, hay algunos trucos fáciles que puedes usar para reducir tus gastos en enero y conseguir superar la cuesta.

Lo primero que necesitas hacer es revisar tu presupuesto. Este paso es esencial para saber dónde te estás gastando tu dinero. Toma unos minutos para revisar todos tus recibos de este mes y de meses anteriores para tener una idea de dónde estás derrochando dinero. Esto te dará una idea de cuáles son los gastos que debes reducir para ahorrar dinero.

Otro trucos es comenzar a usar listas de compras y comprar alimentos a granel. Esto significa hacer una lista de compras antes de salir de compras, asegurándote de que solo compres lo que necesitas. También significa comprar alimentos a granel cuando sea posible. Esto te permite ahorrar dinero al comprar grandes cantidades de alimentos que sabes que usarás en los próximos meses.

También puedes ahorrar dinero evitando el desperdicio de alimentos. Uno de los principales gastos de los hogares es el desperdicio de alimentos. Esto significa que muchas veces compramos demasiados alimentos o los compramos demasiado tarde y se nos echan a perder. Si no quieres desperdiciar alimentos, puedes usar aplicaciones como Waste No Food para encontrar personas que estén dispuestas a comprarte los alimentos que tienes sobrados.

Un truco más para ahorrar en enero es cuidar tu energía. Puedes ahorrar dinero asegurándote de que todas tus luces, electrodomésticos y dispositivos se apaguen cuando no los estés usando. También puedes instalar sensores de movimiento para que los dispositivos solo se enciendan cuando hay alguien en la habitación. Esto significa que tus dispositivos no seguirán consumiendo electricidad cuando nadie los esté usando.

Otro consejo útil es apagar tu televisión y otros dispositivos cuando no los estés usando. Esto significa que no tienes que pagar por el alquiler de películas, programas de televisión o juegos si no los usas. Si los estás usando, puedes cambiar a una tarifa más barata. Por ejemplo, si normalmente tienes una tarifa de alquiler de películas de cinco dólares por mes, puedes cambiar a una tarifa de dos dólares al mes. Esto significa que estarás ahorrando dinero cada mes.

Otro consejo para superar la cuesta de enero es encontrar formas de ganar un poco de dinero extra. Por ejemplo, puedes vender algunos de tus artículos viejos o usados en internet o participar en encuestas remuneradas. Estas son excelentes formas de aumentar tus ingresos y conseguir un poco de dinero extra.

Finalmente, no se te olvide aprovechar los descuentos. Muchos establecimientos ofrecen grandes descuentos durante enero para reducir sus inventarios. Asegúrate de estar al tanto de estas ofertas para que no te pierdas la oportunidad de ahorrar un p

The election of a new Speaker of the House is an important event, as the role plays a crucial role in both domestic and foreign policy debates. It is seen as an integral part of the system of checks and balances that are key to the operation of the US federal government.

According to a recent study by the research firm PayScale, there has been a decrease in the median salaries being offered in the public job market since 2018. PayScale analyzed over 1 million job postings from over 18,000 companies from the United States, Canada, and the United Kingdom. The study found that the median salary range for professional positions decreased from $68,000 to $64,000 during that time period.

Why is this happening? It could be that companies are responding to the demand for salary transparency. Some employers may want to be more competitive in the job market and they may be wary of revealing the true salary range they can offer. By offering a lower range in the job postings, they can keep the salary offer to the employee somewhat hidden until they actually start the job.

At the same time, employers could also be hoping to use salary transparency as a way to drive down their overall cost of wages. If a company can get someone to accept a lower salary than they would have normally gotten, then the company will save money.

For job seekers, this can be frustrating. Many job seekers assume that the salary ranges listed in the job postings are the true salary ranges the company is offering. So you have to tell it how to make a square out of those moves . You might write a program like this : to draw_a_square forward 2 right 90 forward 2 right 90 forward 2 right 90 forward 2 right 90 end If the robot runs that program , it will have drawn a square , and ended up back where it started . You can find the Logo programming language [ here ] ( URL_0 ) for Mac , Windows , Linux , and other systems . Remember how I said that you can use repeated steps ? You can use these to make a program shorter , like this : to draw_a_square repeat 4 [ forward 2 right 90 ] end That 's a lot shorter than the earlier program , but it does the same thing . It 's shorter because instead of repeating instructions ourselves , we tell the robot to repeat doing them . Programs can also take inputs , for instance , telling how big the square should be : to draw_square : size repeat 4 [ forward : size right 90 ] end Or , even , instead of a square , we could draw an arbitrary regular polygon : to draw_polygon : sides : size repeat : sides [ forward : size right ( 360 / : sides ) ] end So , programs can repeat themselves and they can do different things based on their inputs . text:
After FTX's Spectacular Collapse, Where Does Crypto Go From Here?

Once-mighty cryptocurrency exchange FTX is no more. After launching in 2018 to a flurry of excitement from within the industry, FTX had become a titan of the digital asset world, a platform for speculators and token traders to buy, sell, and trade digital coins, tokens, and fiat currencies.

And then, almost as quickly as it rose to prominence, FTX imploded. In a shocking move in early December, the exchange announced that it was shutting down, citing “sustained losses.” Its demise served as a cautionary tale for cryptocurrency investors and a reminder that the industry remains fraught with risks.

But while FTX’s implosion is still reverberating through the crypto world, the industry is looking toward the future. Where does cryptocurrency go from here?

The immediate fallout has been widespread. FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried announced that the company had gone bankrupt, triggering a domino effect in which other companies associated with FTX had to make difficult decisions about their future. For example, FTX-backed derivatives exchange Deribit announced that it was ceasing its trading operations, and decentralized exchange platform Wave Financial announced it was moving its business to another exchange platform.

Despite these challenges, the cryptocurrency industry is as vibrant as ever. Despite the setback for FTX and its investors, the cryptocurrency markets overall have been strong in 2020. Bitcoin, the most well-known cryptocurrency, has had a particularly stellar year, having surged from around $7,000 at the start of the year to an all-time high of over $27,000 at the start of December.

Cryptocurrency has become an increasingly mainstream investment asset, with institutional investors beginning to pour money into the space. This influx of capital has been driven in part by a heightened awareness of the sector’s potential, as well as the continued development of the technology underpinning the asset class.

At the same time, regulators and governments are beginning to pay more attention to the cryptocurrency industry. The US Securities and Exchange Commission recently announced that it will start to regulate digital assets, though the details of how that will be done have yet to be unveiled.

Despite the challenges that remain, the digital asset market continues to evolve and is sure to be an area of great interest in the years to come. As the industry continues to grow and mature, it is likely that it will become a more safe and secure space for investors and traders.

The collapse of FTX may have temporarily stalled the growth of the cryptocurrency sector, but it has not dented its long-term potential. With further regulatory clarity and continued innovation in the technology, the future of the industry looks bright. Cryptocurrency might be a relatively new asset class, but its promise is real — and if managed responsibly, it has the potential to become a major source of value in the years ahead.

text: Not exactly ELI5 but I 'll do my best to take a stab at it with some pseudo code . I 'm coming from a Laravel / PHP angle . Model : Items ; Controller : ItemController ; View : Shops The view Shops is merely a template for lack of better term . Basically we have a page where we are going to spit out the data for a record in our imaginary inventory . The page will have a $ title , and an array $ data . We will get our data from the DB with a model called Items . Think of this as a class that handles all interaction with the DB and abstracts the SQL implementation away . Our Controller titled ItemController will handle all business logic . If $ title = Acme Co. < title > { { $ title } } < /title > = < title > Acme Co. < /title > Now we need to bring the item into the view , right ? For simplicity we 'll just have two things in our array $ data . $ data['price ' ] and $ data['item_name ' ] . price shall be $ 20.00 and item_name shall be RC Car . Fancy . So our view is a very simple html page with a title and a table . < title > { { $ title } } < /title > < table > < tr > < td > Product Name < /td > < td > { { $ data['item_name ' ] } } < /td > < /tr > < tr > < td > Price < d > < td > { { $ data['price ' ] } } < /td > < /tr > Now we have the same thing but parsed : < table > < tr > < td > Product Name < /td > < td > RC Car < /td > < /tr > < tr > < td > Price < d > < td > $ 20.00 < /td > < /tr > Now imagine if $ data had several more indexes . We have one view that we pass this data to . But how do we get the data ? The model , right ? Well , yes and no . So a brief bit ; tying business logic to your view ( the pretty ) makes for a mess . It 's like putting everything into a blender for a beverage and then not putting the lid on . When it 's done you then swing it around to really get everything everywhere . Now then . The controller handles this pairing . We have things called routes , so we 're going to tell the application(website ) to point to the ItemController when the page is requested . For instance , Route::get('item/{id } ' , ' InventoryController@show ) ; So what does that do ? Simple , really . In our InventoryController class we have a method called show . All we 're doing is saying when item is requested go here if there is a parameter ( { i d } ) . So say our RC car above had an i d of 0 . We 'd go to : URL_0 and the example above would be rendered . Controller time ! InventoryController extends Controller { public function show($id ) { //Item is in our auto load . This class is accessible app wide . $ data = Item::where('id ' , ' = ' , $ i d ) ; $ title = " Viewing Details for " . data['item_name ' ] ; //View is in the same boat . Auto loaded . return View::make('itempage.view.php ' , $ title)- > with("data " , $ data ) ; } } All of that returns the view above , just like before . Now though , we 're going to spice it up ! We have another product . i d = 1 ; item_name = " RC Boat " ; price = " $ 25.00 " ; When we call to URL_1 guess what ! Our application automagically fills in the information for the item matching the i d of 1 . Fancy ! Back to the ELI5 attempt : Automatic coloring books and stencils = MVC . ( kind of ) . Code Reuse ( stencils ) is considered , for good reason , to be a sign of a capable developer . We get to reuse the same files passing in only a parameter to change the outcome . When we first called the page we had an i d of 0 . The RC Car was returned . Then we simply changed the URL to have a 1 which returned the RC Boat . Same files different page . In a real world example we 'd probably have a master page(coloring book ) that served as the main template for all pages . This would have our CSS , JS , and other elements all centrally located . MVC means you no longer have to update your pages individually to change something like your navigation or header . It 's all in one spot . It means no need for nasty database interaction spattered all over your php files . All of that is handled in your database object . That is a central concept . Centralized code management and maintenance . I do n't think I quite hit the ELI5 nail on the head , but I hope this helps anyone that might be confused . I know it took me a bit to figure out this MVC thing .

text: Sure! Converting a number from binary to decimal is actually pretty easy. Here's how to do it:  1. Write down the binary number.  2. Starting from the rightmost digit, assign the value of 0 to the rightmost digit, 1 to the second rightmost digit, 2 to the third rightmost digit, and so on.  3. For each digit, multiply the value of that digit by the corresponding power of 2. For example, the value of the rightmost digit (which is 0 or 1) should be multiplied by 2 to the power of 0, the value of the second rightmost digit should be multiplied by 2 to the power of 1, and so on.  4. Add up all of the products from step 3 to get the decimal equivalent of the binary number.  Here's an example: let's convert the binary number 1011 (which is 11 in decimal) to decimal.  1. Write down the binary number: 1011  2. Assign values to each digit: 1 * 2^3 + 0 * 2^2 + 1 * 2^1 + 1 * 2^0  3. Calculate the products: 8 + 0 + 2 + 1 = 11  4. Add up the products: 11  So the decimal equivalent of 1011 is 11.  I hope that helps! Let me know if you have any questions.

Size: A 1 TB RAM module would be physically very large and would take up a lot of space on a motherboard. This would make it difficult to fit inside a typical computer case and would make the overall computer system much larger and less portable.

Cost: A 1 TB RAM module would be very expensive to produce. This would make the overall cost of the computer system much higher and would make it less affordable for most people.

Power: A 1 TB RAM module would require a lot of power to operate. This would make the overall power consumption of the computer system much higher, which would lead to shorter battery life and higher energy bills.

Speed: Although having a large amount of RAM would certainly make a computer faster in some ways, it would not necessarily make it faster overall. This is because the speed of a computer is determined by a combination of factors, including the processor speed, the speed of the storage (such as an SSD), and the speed of the RAM. So while adding more RAM might help in some cases, it's not a magic solution that will make a computer faster in all cases.

text: Excess Cash = Cash & Equivalents + Long-Term Investments - Current Liabilities The problem this calculation of excess cash is that "long-term investments" can be illiquid things like real estate. The first thing I'd do is "net out" Current Assets and Current Liabilities, then add Cash back in.  Excess Cash = Current Assets - Current Liabilities + Cash & Equivalents. Ausbildung & Gehalt: So sieht mein Alltag als Bäcker-Azubi aus

Als Azubi einer Berufsausbildung zum Bäcker hat man viel zu lernen und jeden Tag eine Menge zu tun. Es ist nicht nur eine Herausforderung und ein Abenteuer, sondern auch eine lohnende Erfahrung. Ich will Ihnen in diesem Artikel erzählen, wie mein Alltag als Bäcker-Azubi aussieht.

Der erste Teil meines Tages beginnt mit einem ausgiebigen Frühstück. Dann mache ich mich auf den Weg zur Bäckerei und dort beginnt mein Tag mit dem Einschlagen und Ausrollen des Teigs. Danach bereite ich eine Vielzahl von Backwaren vor, die ich dann in den Ofen schiebe. Je nach Bedarf backe ich vor allem Weiß- und Roggenbrötchen und verschiedene Brötchen, aber auch Kuchen und Kekse.

Auch im restlichen Tag werde ich auf verschiedene Weise in der Bäckerei eingesetzt. Ich arbeite oft in der Kundenbetreuung und nehme Bestellungen entgegen. Auch bin ich immer wieder auf Warenpräsentationen oder anderen Veranstaltungen für das Unternehmen.

Nach der Arbeit mache ich meist noch ein kurzes Training, bevor ich mich auf den Weg nach Hause mache. Dort habe ich noch etwas Freizeit, bevor ich mich vor dem Einschlafen noch einmal in meinen Lehrplan einlese.

Der Lehre hat für mich eine Menge Vorteile und bringt mir viel neues Wissen über die Bäckerei. Ich lerne unter anderem die Grundlagen der Backkunst, das Herstellen von Teigen und die verschiedenen Sorten von Backwaren. Mit der Zeit bekomme ich auch ein Gespür dafür, was die Kunden wollen und wie man die besten Backwaren herstellt.

Außerdem lerne ich, wie man Backwaren richtig verkauft und sich in der Bäckerei zurechtfindet. Alle diese Dinge werden mir schrittweise im Unterricht beigebracht und ich kann das, was ich gelernt habe, in der Praxis anwenden.

Der wichtigste Teil meiner Ausbildung ist aber die Berufsausbildung. Hier erhalte ich ein monatliches Gehalt, in dem der Mindestlohn enthalten ist, aber auch andere Zulagen und Prämien. So habe ich genug Geld, um meinen Lebensunterhalt zu bestreiten und kann auch ein wenig Rücklagen bilden.

Der Alltag als Bäcker-Azubi ist sehr abwechslungsreich, aber auch hart. Trotzdem kann ich zufrieden sein, denn die Anstrengungen zahlen sich aus und am Ende meiner Ausbildung werde ich ein richtiger Bäcker sein.
label: machine

text: The tl;dr version : It is transferring the data from the slow hard disk to fast RAM . Longer version : Computer systems have two main types of memory . There is hard drive / flash storage , and there is RAM ( Random Access Memory . ) Storage does not require power to maintain , and wo n't go away when the computer is off . This is where your files and programs are stored . RAM requires power to maintain -- if you shut the system off , it gets cleared . However , RAM is * way * faster than hard drive / flash storage . To do useful things with information stored on the hard drive , it has to be transferred into RAM . This is mainly what is happening when something is loading . In addition , sometimes levels and game data are stored in a form that is optimized to take up less space on a hard drive , but must be expanded when actually used . The system might be doing this as well , or it might be precomputing certain things like lighting so that it does n't have to do this in realtime while the game is running . In the case of console games , it does something similar , but usually from a CD / DVD / Blu - Ray instead of a hard drive .
label: hc3human
